did.unittitle: State University of New York Board of Trustees Records1950-1994

did.abstract: State University of New York, Borad of Trustees Records document the activities of all of the State University of New York campus statewide from

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this record group is unrestricted.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for conforming with the laws of copyright. Whenever possible, the M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives will provide information about copyright owners and other restrictions, but the legal determination ultimately rests with the researcher. Requests for permission to publish material from this collection should be discussed with the Head of Special Collections and Archives

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: All items in this manuscript group were donated to the University Libraries, M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: An artificial collection of official records of the State University of New York, a 64 campus statewide system of higher education established under Gov. Thomas E. Dewey in 1948 with Central Administration headquarters in Albany, New York. Includes system-wide planning documents, reports, and other official publications (principally, News), 1958- 1984 & selected Board of Trustees minutes, 1950-70, and policies, 1954-90, and also board member correspondence files kept by the Student Association of the State University of New York (SASU), 1971-81.

The records of the Office of the President (UA-000) include summary minutes of the SUNY Board of Trustees meetings for 1968, 1970-1984. Related collections include: the papers of Donald Blinken (APAP-080)& the records of the State University Construciton (APAP-097)& the records of the State University of New York, University Faculty Senate (APAP-093)& and the records of the Student Association of the State University of New York (SASU) (APAP-046).

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: The collection is organized into the following series:

list.item: Series 7: Policies of the Board of Trustees, 1954-1984

arrangement.p: Series 1,2,6 and 7 are arranged chronologically. Series 3 and 4 are arranged alphabetically. Series 5 is arranged randomly [neither chronologically nor alphabetically].

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, State University of New York Board of Trustees Records, 1950-1994. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York (hereafter referred to as [shortened name]).
